correctness.rationale: Multiple severe schema violations and several ungrounded or incorrect entries. Key issues: (1) Numerous numeric fields are null, violating the schema’s number type: processParameters.pressure.quantityValue.numericValue, thicknessControl.growthPerCycle.values[*].value.quantityValue.numericValue, numberofCycles, nucleationPeriod, dosingTime[*].precursor/coReactant, purgeTime[*].precursor/coReactant, flowRates[*].precursorFlow/coReactantFlow/purgingGasFlow, materialProperties.uniformity.variation, conformality.aspectRatio, roughness.value, filmDensity.value, deviceProperties.onOffRatio. (2) processParameters.plasmaPower is set to None though the process is thermal ALD; this field should be omitted or provided as a valid object if PEALD were used. (3) reactantSelection.carrierGas and purgingGas are filled with the placeholder string “Not Found,” which is not traceable to the article and does not meet the factuality requirement (schema requires valid strings; the article does not report these). (4) supercycleDesign.numberofSubcycles counts are present with null numeric values; the article does not provide a:b:c counts—either omit counts or provide grounded numbers (only subcycleSequence is supported by the text). (5) filmComposition.atomicRatio is misrepresented: value “0.71” with elements ["In","Ga","Zn"] is inconsistent; the article reports only the In/Ga ratio of 0.71. This should be modeled as elements ["In","Ga"] with a colon-separated value (e.g., "0.71:1"); no Zn ratio is given. (6) crystallinity.phase "amorphous" is asserted without explicit support in the paper (no XRD/TEM evidence cited). (7) deviceProperties.thresholdVoltage uses V_ON (−1.1 V) in place of a defined threshold voltage; this should be labeled as turn-on voltage or omitted if V_TH is not reported. (8) processParameters.saturation is set to True without textual support. Correct items include: ALD method (thermal) for InOx/GaOx/ZnO, IGZO deposited at 200 °C, precursors (TEIn, In–Ga bimetallic, DEZn) and O3 co-reactant, substrate description (vertical Al2O3 spacer sidewalls), IGZO thickness 5 nm (Dev-A), and optical band gap 3.14 eV from SE. To correct: remove or properly populate all fields now holding nulls; omit plasmaPower for TALD; provide only traceable values (do not use “Not Found”); fix atomicRatio to reflect In/Ga=0.71; refrain from asserting crystallinity and saturation unless supported; use device parameter names that match the article (V_ON, SS). Overall, the current extraction is not schema-compliant and contains many non-traceable placeholders.

completeness.rationale: The extraction is highly incomplete and violates key schema constraints. Only one IGZO ALD process (5 nm) is represented, while the article clearly reports multiple IGZO depositions with different channel thicknesses (5, 10, 15 nm; Dev-A/B/C). Required schema fields contain nulls or placeholders: processParameters.pressure (numericValue = None), thicknessControl.growthPerCycle.values (numericValue = None for all compounds), thicknessControl.numberofCycles (None), nucleationPeriod (None), dosingTime/purgeTime/flowRates (all numericValue = None), and many material/device properties (uniformity.variation, conformality.aspectRatio, roughness.value, filmDensity.value, electricalProperties, mobility, onOffRatio) are missing or set to None. Using "Not Found" for carrierGas/purgingGas and guessed subcycleSequence lacks traceability to the text. supercycleDesign.numberofSubcycles are unspecified (None), and atomicRatio is incorrect (elements listed as [In, Ga, Zn] but value given as a single In/Ga ratio “0.71”; should be elements ['In','Ga'] with a colon-form ratio, e.g., '0.71:1', or a full In:Ga:Zn ratio if reported). plasmaPower is set to None (should be omitted if not PEALD). Reactor details are not provided. Multiple ALD processes described in the article (e.g., Al2O3 spacer at 150 °C with TMA/H2O and GI/PL at 200 °C with TMA/O3) are not extracted, though the IGZO-focused scope would at minimum require separate IGZO processes for each thickness condition. To improve completeness: add separate IGZO processes for Dev-A/B/C with correct film thickness and schema-compliant parameters; replace all None/placeholder values with traceable numeric values (pressure, GPC, cycles, dosing/purge times, flows) or omit optional fields; correct atomicRatio and provide characterization method; and remove ungrounded assumptions (e.g., subcycle sequence) unless supported by the text.
